item.title: Who Is Ishwar Bhati?
item.description:
title: “About Coach Ishwar Bhati” date: 2025-05-27 author: “IB Sports Academy” cover: “/images/coach-ishwar-bhati-profile.jpg” summary: “Meet Coach Ishwar Bhati, the visionary founder and head coach of IB Sports Academy, dedicated to empowering youth and transforming Indian basketball.” tags: [“Ishwar Bhati”, “Head Coach”, “IB Sports Academy”, “Basketball India”, “Youth Empowerment”]

About Coach Ishwar Bhati

Founder & Head Coach, IB Sports Academy

Inspiring the Next Generation of Indian Basketball

Coach Ishwar Bhati is a trailblazer in Indian basketball coaching and the driving force behind IB Sports Academy. With over 15 years of experience, he has dedicated his life to empowering young athletes and transforming the landscape of grassroots basketball in India.
